thread.title: Comment on ‘Rising Star’ App: Voting – How To Vote as a Home Judge by garry
thread.title_full: Comment on ‘Rising Star’ App: Voting – How To Vote as a Home Judge by garry

author: garry
title: Comment on ‘Rising Star’ App: Voting – How To Vote as a Home Judge by garry
text:
‘Rising Star’ App: Voting – How To Vote as a Home Judge Published Updated 3:32 pm EST, April 17, 2015 10 Comments By Lauren Weigle 229 Share Tweet Follow 
Singing competition Rising Star premieres this coming Sunday on ABC at 9:00 p.m., but you need to get ready for your job as a home judge. Watch the above video for the easy tutorial on how to use the Rising Star voting app. Check out how to download the app, how to use it, how you can see your photo on TV, and how to “raise the wall.” 
If you’d like to download the app now, click here . 
Start your week off right w/ our #RaiseTheWall to Win Sweeps. Here’s what you need to know: http://t.co/nBVPoRyz96 pic.twitter.com/2Ns73oQpWG 
— Rising Star (@RisingStarABC) June 16, 2014 
For those of you who want to start getting the hang of the app, there is currently a sweepstakes going on, which you can check out the info for in the above tweet. Plus, on The Bachelorette tonight, you will get the opportunity to “raise the wall.” This will familiarize yourself with the app so that you are ready for Sunday. ABC provides you with the steps on how to do this: 
Step 1: Download the Rising Star App. Pretty simple, right? 
Step 2: Tune in to The Bachelorette MONDAY JUNE 16 8|7c and enjoy the show, but keep your device handy. We’ll let you know when it’s time to check in to vote. 
Step 3: When we let you know during the show, use the Rising Star App to check in and vote to raise the wall! 
Now you’re all set to go!
